content: प्रहृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To strike, strike at, beat; लत्तया प्रहरति ‘kicks’; <ls>R. 5. 58</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 70</ls>; <ls>Bk. 9. 7.</ls> {@--2@} To hurt, injure, wound (with <ab>loc.</ab>); आर्तत्राणाय वः शस्त्रं न प्रहर्तुमनागसि <ls>Ś. 1. 11</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 62</ls>; <ls n="R.">7. 59</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 84</ls>; <ls n="R.">15. 3.</ls> {@--3@} To attack, assault. {@--4@} To throw, cast, hurl (with <ab>loc.</ab> or <ab>dat.</ab>). {@--5@} To seize upon. {@--6@} To offer, present (<ab>Ved.</ab>)
